name: CallHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask Call Helper to give me a prompt”
”Alexa, ask Call Helper to give me another prompt”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call helper
des: Call Helper makes catching up with friends and family easier with random discussion prompts, and is a skill compatible with all Alexa devices. Say "Alexa, open Call Helper" to launch this skill. Once launched, you can say "give me a prompt " to get a random discussion prompt. If you want another prompt after that, say "give me another prompt."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
